periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. South wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. South wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10am and noon, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny. High near 82, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7am. Sunny, with a high near 64. West northwest wind 10 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 43. West southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 70. South southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Clear then Slight Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 1am. Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West southwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Sunny
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7am. Sunny, with a high near 68. West northwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 41. West northwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. Southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. South southwest wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. West southwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
